sections.heading: carrier; cost.The health carrier against which a request for a standard external review or an expedited external review is filed shall pay the cost of the independent review organization for conducting the external review

sections.text:
44-1316.Health carrier; cost.

The health carrier against which a request for a standard external review or an expedited external review is filed shall pay the cost of the independent review organization for conducting the external review.

SourceLaws 2013, LB147, ยง 16.
